text: :There is also Hugh Cook (science fiction author), born in England, who also lived in New Zealand and Japan. Hugh Cook (born 1942) is a Canadian writer. ==Bibliography== *Cracked Wheat and Other Stories - 1985 () *The Homecoming Man - 1989 () *Home in Alfalfa - 1998 () Cook, Hugh Category:1942 births Category:Living people
title: Hugh Cook
